frontmatter.preview: Craving Kotlin's secure pattern matching on sealed classes for your C# code? Discover how the Visitor Pattern can satisfy your longing!

frontmatter.preview: Learn how to easily check the status of your MongoDB operations with this step-by-step guide.

frontmatter.preview: Do you want to improve performance of caching? Get rid of Dictionary and use just CLR for that!

frontmatter.title: Testing Private Code in C#: Breaking Encapsulation with InternalsVisibleTo Attribute
frontmatter.preview: Learn about the different options available for testing private logic in C# and how the InternalsVisibleTo attribute can help you access internal members without compromising the encapsulation of your code.

frontmatter.preview: Learn how to use "magic" attributes in C#, such as CallerFilePath, CallerLineNumber, and CallerMemberName, to retrieve caller information and improve logging functionality.

frontmatter.preview: Discover the simple yet powerful technique of using bitwise shift operator in C# Enums, and how it can improve the readability and maintainability of your code.
